queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[10].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[10].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-external-metrics-reader}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-external-metrics-reader}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[4].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[4].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[7].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[7].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[8].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[8].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-external-metrics-reader}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-external-metrics-reader}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[1].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[1].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-minimal-cluster-role}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-minimal-cluster-role}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[3].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[3].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[4].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[4].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[9].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[9].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-certs}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-certs}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{keda-operator}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{keda-operator}}.securityContext.runAsUser is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-metrics-apiserver}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{keda-operator-metrics-apiserver}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-metrics-apiserver}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{keda-operator-metrics-apiserver}}.securityContext.runAsUser is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-admission-webhooks}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{keda-admission-webhooks}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-admission-webhooks}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{keda-admission-webhooks}}.securityContext.runAsUser is undefined

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[2] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules[2] is granted read access (verbs: list, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-certs}}.rules[1] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-certs}}.rules[1] is granted read access (verbs: get) to Secrets objects

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-admission-webhooks}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-admission-webhooks}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is true

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-metrics-apiserver}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-metrics-apiserver}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is true

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is true

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["list", "watch"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["list", "watch"]]

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{keda-operator-certs}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{keda-operator-certs}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["get"]]

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-metrics-apiserver}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{keda-operator-metrics-apiserver}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-metrics-apiserver}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{keda-operator-metrics-apiserver}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{keda-operator}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{keda-operator}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-admission-webhooks}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{keda-admission-webhooks}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-admission-webhooks}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{keda-admission-webhooks}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-admission-webhooks}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-admission-webhooks}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-metrics-apiserver}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-metrics-apiserver}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-metrics-apiserver}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator-metrics-apiserver}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-admission-webhooks}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-admission-webhooks}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{keda-operator}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
